page.title: 12Farming
page.content: The smell of pig was in the air as we approached the pig farm. The man who owned it greeted us and gave us some information about his 2500 odd pig farm. He showed us some pigs and we noticed that one had foam around its mouth,as if it had a shave. Then we went in to see the sows. One had had a litter the night before with two healthy piglets, looking just like silk. All of those sows were in heated quarters. The day starts on the farm at 7.30.a.m. when the men arrive. There are 200 sows and they eat 1.2 tons of feed each,during a year.The food is a compound of cereal,fish and vitamins. Each piglet will eat nearly 400 pounds of food before they are sent to market at Lichfield or sent to the bacon factory.We had disturbed the pigs, so we thanked the farmer and left.
